user_stories.story: As the phase-loop controller (isdlc.md), I need the orchestrator to return control after Phase 01 so that I can manage subsequent phases with per-phase task visibility and hook enforcement.
As a developer using supervised mode, I need the orchestrator to respect execution mode boundaries so that review gates between phases are not bypassed.
As the framework, I need controlled execution modes (init-and-phase-01, single-phase, finalize) to each return structured JSON results so that the calling controller can parse and act on them.
As a developer running full-workflow mode (no MODE parameter), I need the orchestrator to continue working autonomously so that backward compatibility is maintained.
